title: Please take me out of bronze.
body: I don't belong here with these other scrubs.

replies.body: The sad thing is, you do. QQ
Look pal, bronze is just another word for blind pick. I'll be willing to teach you, but I don't want you to be like "oh, but so and so did this" or "i think this is better".

> [{quoted}](name=Greek is fat,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=E5Px2IjY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-21T07:29:40.165+0000)
>
> Look pal, bronze is just another word for blind pick. I'll be willing to teach you, but I don't want you to be like "oh, but so and so did this" or "i think this is better".

hi, teach me.
According to your match history, your farm/cs is bad. Try perfecting that and ganking more often, you'll win 99% of bronze games.

> [{quoted}](name=ItsOrval,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=E5Px2IjY,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-03-21T08:13:44.837+0000)
>
> According to your match history, your farm/cs is bad. Try perfecting that and ganking more often, you'll win 99% of bronze games.

My CS has gotten better after I started playing Annie.
If you want tips I'll help u get to gold but your attitude needs to change
